Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1460 BROADWAY, NEW YORK, New York, 10036, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: FingerMotion Inc is engaged in the provision of mobile payment and recharge services in the China market. The company business line includes Mobile Data Service Platform, Mobile Payment and Recharge Platform, and Big Data Insights. It principally earns revenue by providing mobile payment and recharge services to customers of telecommunications companies in China.
